relevant_findings.HEENT: No conjunctival pallor, no icterus, moist mucous membranes, oropharynx clear
relevant_findings.neck: Right lymph node ~2cm x 1cm, firm, mobile, nontender
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Normocardic, regular, normal S1, S2, no murmurs
relevant_findings.lungs: No increased work of breathing, clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdominal: Normal bowel sounds, soft, nontender, nondistended
relevant_findings.skin: Ecchymosis over right upper extremity where PICC was inserted, port site ecchymosis inferiorly
